price: [It will be said], “Taste your punishment! This is what you were seeking to hasten.”
arabic: ذُوقُواْ فِتۡنَتَكُمۡ هَٰذَا ٱلَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِۦ تَسۡتَعۡجِلُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
